dialogue.introduction: First of the Yamato-class battleships, Yamato. Now with much upgraded anti-air weaponry.
dialogue.library_intro: 1st of the Yamato-class battleships, Yamato.  The armada's trump card, I was made in utmost secrecy at the Kure Naval Yard. With the most up-to-date and sophisticated technology concentrated in my body, along with the 2nd ship, Musashi, I will do my best as the centre of the combined fleet!
dialogue.secretary2: Awww...stop calling me the hotel already!
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral? Erm~ well...my living condition is a level above the other ship girls...is that okay?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Nnn.. Ah, sorry Admiral. Are my main guns in the way?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, are you not a bit tired?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, as always, thank you. The duty of being the flagship of the combined fleet, shooting at the enemy ships; everything pales in comparison to now. Iâ€¦ with the Admiral, by your side, I will do my best.
dialogue.show_players_score: Our fleet's battle results? Looking forward to it.
dialogue.equipment1: Anti-air, Anti-ship. Which one should I be focused on...?
dialogue.equipment2: Yamato is pleased. Thank you, admiral!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I shall take a short bath.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I...I didn't underestimate (the enemy), though I'm sorry.
dialogue.docking_complete: Repairing of the ship daughter seems to be completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: New ship girls has been added to our lineup.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Our fleet has returned safely. That's great~!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Battleship Yamato, will go to war!
dialogue.night_attack: Is that so... well then, I have to do this!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Is that so... well then, I have to do this!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Is that so... well then, I have to do this!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Is that so... well then, I have to do this!
dialogue.mvp: Yamato is number one? I'm a bit proud of myself. Leave the next sortie to me!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: D-did you think you got a direct hit?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Have to reduce the listing...flood ballast tanks, quickly!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Hmph, Yamato, will not, sink at such place!
dialogue.sunk: Again... I pass away... all hands... top deck... Musashi... Shinano... I leave the rest to you...

hourly.0100: 0100. Admiral, shouldn't you be going to bed soon?
hourly.0200: Admiral? Not going to bed, are you okay? It is now 0200.
hourly.0300: 0300. At this time, certainly shouldn't you be tired?
hourly.0400: It is now 0400. Admiral, it will soon be morning.
hourly.0500: Admiral, 0500. The sky is becoming white now.
hourly.0600: It's Morning. 0600. Admiral, the morning really came quickly, didn't it?
hourly.0700: 0700, Breakfast time. How about some of Hotel Yamato's famous consomme?
hourly.0800: It is now 0800. The combined fleet will be moving soon.
hourly.0900: 0900. Admiral, how is today's battle mobilization going?
hourly.1000: Admiral, how are the other fleets? It is currently 1000.
hourly.1100: 1100. I have to start preparing for lunch soon... What would be good?
hourly.1200: 1200. Hotel Yamato's famous lunch time's... wait, I'm not a hotel.
hourly.1300: It's 1300. You get a bit tired after eating, yes?
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral, will you have a Ramune?
hourly.1700: 1700, Admiral, it's almost time for the sunset.
hourly.1800: It is now 1800. Shall we let half the ship go ashore today?
hourly.1900: 1900. The fleet work has ended, let's have dinner.
hourly.2000: 2000. Dinner is a full course~, after all, Hotel Yamato's...
hourly.2100: 2100. Admiral, why not partake of Yamato's livability?
hourly.2200: It is now 2200. Time for a bath, yes?
hourly.2300: It is 2300. Admiral, today, as always, thank you for your hard work.
